website_summaries.verdict: A slightly smaller remote that's good for the little hands in your house.
pros: Smaller and lighter weight than original
Many users say it works as well as original remotes

customer_reviews.title: Works just like the original controllers
customer_reviews.text: My kids pulled out the cable from their other controller so I bought this as a replacement. It has worked great so far and they haven't had any trouble with it. I like that it comes with the silicone protector.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Houston

customer_reviews.title: for now they are pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how well they work to be non-original ones, they do not consume a lot of battery and the motion plus works quite well, the only bad thing is that they are a bit sensitive to aim, and I don't know if it was because of the game itself but when I was playing new super mario wolrd with my brothers, they went out every time I died Another strange thing is that at first he does not recognize the movements well but now he goes without any problem but if it keeps working that well, maybe I'll buy another pair in the future
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Pereyra

customer_reviews.title: Wii Motion Plus- Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this controller would not be compatible with my Wii Motion Plus console. It is Totally Compatible and works just fine!! I really like how the Amazon description explains how to synchronize the controller with the Wii console!! It was simple and fast! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: David Hill

customer_reviews.title: Looks / Works like the original.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it that long and I was somewhat concerned that it may not be the same as the original. The good news is that it appears identical and works identically to the original. No bad news at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better price than local stores
customer_reviews.text: used for first time...no different than one I bought with the system 5 years ago. thanks! all functions seem to work perfectly thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Holder

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for this for the longest time! I received it very quickly and everything works perfect! He and my daughter each got one and they are HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing came super quick, synced super easy, and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars 😊 plus bonus surprise
customer_reviews.text: Very timely shipping, came well packaged, was exactly what I hoped for 😁looking forward to playing my wii again
customer_reviews.author: Traci Dawn

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy
customer_reviews.text: It is working as good as the originals my kids use the controls and they haven't complain. They are happy playing in this quarantine times.
customer_reviews.author: Lilisema

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I’m not into video games. However, my kids are. They said it works great!
customer_reviews.author: AnQuinetta Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind customer
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Company offered to rectify this situation and offer a refund when my controller went bad. Very well backed up by customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DefoMama

customer_reviews.title: Buttons Don’t Work Properly
customer_reviews.text: It connected very easily and haven’t had a problem with it connecting to the wii. My issue is that the icon the screen shakes so if you are playing any sort of game that requires any sort of balance or hold still (Petz Sportz for example) it is impossible to use. I wasn’t really too please as the B button and the minus button also keeps going in and out every twenty seconds so if you have to hold down the B button or minus button (example Dog Island) it is also impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but it eats up battery life like nothing else we've ever used. We have two Wii remotes (came with our original console) and the battery life for those is 2 weeks. This one is 8 hrs. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just like anyone else I didnt feel like spending all the money on a real controller so I bought this, quite cheap and low quality. The A button is mushy, some of the other buttons are too clicky and unsatisfying, the built in motionplus is terrible and slow, playing wii sport resort is a pain. The detection overall is slow and it's made of a cheap plastic that doesnt feel durable. The nunchuck is ok, but then again cheap quality. The rubber case is alright, though it fits horribly and kills my OCD.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little trial and error, but finally works. TIP: Make sure to have fully charged or brand new batteries when installing. It still feels a little akward, but works. Control & Nunchuck work. The control audio is a little distorted. Overall it does it's job. Good generic option for the Wii motion plus controller.
customer_reviews.author: Marc. R.

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting (I probably expected too much for the price to be fair) the pictures don’t show words on the remote which I’d prefer. Has a different vibrate and sound seems a bit off compared to my Wii remote but overall I’d say you get what you pay for. It worked on a game that requires the motion sensor. I think I’m going to return though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as good as the original Wii remotes!
customer_reviews.text: My original Wii remote control couldn't be powered on any more. A new pair of OEM remotes with Motion Plus and Nunchuck costs more than the whole Wii gaming system. I did research on Amazon for third-party replacements and The PowerLead products had the best reviews and one of the most reasonable price. I pulled the trigger on the Prime day. The shipping was fast and the product didn't disappoint. Overall, the controller is of good build quality and lighter than the original one. This is exactly what I looked for because I mostly play the Wii games with my 3-yr daughter. The accuracy and response time are as good as the original control. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect with my system
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't connect to my system. Tried many different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Works most of the time but with problems
customer_reviews.text: Remotes worked well for the first week or so then developed problems. One remote started making noises that can only be explained as weird. It will go from a loud screeching to completely silent. Both remotes will at times will stop working as expected and then return to normal the next time. Guess you only get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Nunchuk broke after one week!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great...for a week! The nunchuk then broke. I would definitely not buy this brand. Stick to the name brand wii remote. I have two of those, and they have been working for 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: dhoped123

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great remote. Using their instructions it connected quickly and works flawlessly. Love that my boys are no longer arguing over a remote that works.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the real Wii remote, but has a different sound when playing. I knew that from other reviewers out there. The sound is no big deal. It’s very responsive, and eats the batteries pretty quickly-just like the real wii remote. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: alwayshappy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This controller worked like a charm. No more having to add the motion plus attachment, it's all built in to this. And the blue color is great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pfister

customer_reviews.title: Wii Sports Pro: “this contoller is bad”
customer_reviews.text: This contoller is bad. The motion detection is impossible to calibrate and timing is variable. It makes Wii games a lot more challenging, which is kinda neat, but I cannot hit a wiiball homerun no matter how hard and perfectly timed my swing is—and I fricken smash in wiiball. I absolutely RIP taters, pull side, oppo, 400’ ropes and 600’ OOTP!! This controller, however, is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: nunchuck control is hard to use, and does not have motion control. Remote works well,however it is jumpy and you have to turn the controller sideways to get it to work. If you just want something a little cheaper I would save your money and get an actual Wii brand remote and nunchuck
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Work fine, no problem
customer_reviews.text: If you’re gonna me me write a review for everything I’m not gonna review it. It’s a 5 star product because it’s exactly as it purports to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Beyel

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with DolphinBar
customer_reviews.text: Being a third-party wiimote, it doesn't support dolphinbar (can connect but no actual output). It can be connected to PC by Bluetooth passthrough though. Either use this on an official wii or play games that do not require cursor function
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Drops connection to receiver repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time but requires multistep set up to connect to the game consul. Once I figured that out with help of google it connected but then as I used it for games it cut out every few seconds and had to reset. To do that you have to put the controller down on a flat surface for 3-4 seconds and wait for it to calibrate and then continue. Made playing continuous games impossible. I ordered a return label to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect well
customer_reviews.text: Nunchuck plug doesn't fit well.. and falls apart upon removal. Also loses sync with wii frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Batter_E_Juice

customer_reviews.title: Strap missing and quit after one day
customer_reviews.text: One strap was missing and they quit working after one day. I cannot afford those batteries every day. One of the remotes would just shut off in the middle of the play...I returned them
customer_reviews.author: KFireLady

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects when shake hard
customer_reviews.text: This wii remote disconnects when I shake it hard during play time. The motion detection is not as good as the orignal wii remote plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cutest

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 30 days ago and the Wii started displaying a Motion Plus error at times. It would try to re-connect and calibrate, which rarely succeeded. Soon after the controller started shutting off in the middle of use. I doubted the batteries were dead, but I tried replacing them anyway. Didn't help. Now the controller won't turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how it is supposed to with my Wii system. Easy set up. Good customer support if you need help. Came with instructions. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: They didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 and the first one worked the first day, but not after that. The 2nd and 3rd ones wouldn't work at all so I didn't bother trying the 4th one. Instead I bought used Nintendo brand remote controls and they work just fine. The Powerlead brand just didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Betty Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Low standards are easy to meet
customer_reviews.text: Have had trouble with a couple different games like throwing a football and other sports games. Overall it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: chance
customer_reviews.text: Had a chance to use the remote game control over the Christmas while playing Wii. The remote charged without any problems. It was responsive and was able to be used immediately once charged. I have no problems with this product and would recommend if you are looking to replacing your remote controls or looking to adding to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great job sturdy and very much able to withstand 2 hyper kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great controller that worked the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I got the blue one and my kids loved it. Now I have to get the other colours. It synced easily and works just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement remote
customer_reviews.text: Synced to our Wii system. Seems to be working as expected. Connects fast at startup. Anyone needing a replacement Wii Controller would do fine with this.
customer_reviews.author: StillShopping

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Average price for this item but good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not the Nintendo brand but worked just as good. And looks sleek
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: No Go?
customer_reviews.text: The device does not detect motion readily, requires multiple attempts before the Wii U will recognize. We are reaching out to Yoomwa.com directly for assistance as the insert directed for warranty issues having received 8th of October. So, more to follow once we hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: really
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this purchase. The controller seems just as good quality as an original Nintendo version but was a lot cheaper. It works well so far, we've played a number of games using it and have had no issues at all. It feels robust and sturdy and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas t isbell

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Seems our unit is defective as it is inconsistent with powering on, connecting to console, and functioning with remote buttons/motion plus features in general.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: It's Decent
customer_reviews.text: The actual controller is a bit different from the picture, and the controller is a hair worst then the normal controller. At least it works for the Pro games which was the main perpous though.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Slow on-screen recognition
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Takes a while for it to be recognized on the screen to make selections, but when it does no problem.
customer_reviews.author: thomonica ware

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an additional remote. Would recommend everyone has more than one remote so you can take up the challenge and battle your friends. Also if you have rechargable batteries, you can put one on charge whilst playing so no need to stop the fun because of flat batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Wii remote replacement
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoyed the use of it , hope it lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Ok product!
customer_reviews.text: The remote works well with the game but it’s a battery killer. You’ll probably spend just as much money on batteries as you would an official Nintendo wii remote.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Works but not great
customer_reviews.text: Does not function as well as an actual Wii controller. The motion is off and it takes forever to calibrate. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lowroller

customer_reviews.title: Built in Motion Plus Detector Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The built in motion plus detector doesn't work. So bummed. I only ordered it because it says there is a built in motion plus detector. ughhh
customer_reviews.author: DaniD

customer_reviews.title: Save money for name brand
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about it is cheep, but it works for the most part. Only thing that doesn’t work is the motion sensor in the joystick controller, and apart from that everything is slow.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bower

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but looks a little different
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it is advertised to look different. The black one is the one I bought and the pink one is my old one. The new one says "New 2 in 1" and "Motion Plus."
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH DOLPHIN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller wanting to use it with dolphin. It was a little messy at first but after figuring it out it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Spring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful color, really fast delivery and a perfect gift for my niece
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: Buttons will start getting stuck quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a little while than the buttons 1 and 2 started getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: Iron Fingaz

customer_reviews.title: Overall good item
customer_reviews.text: We deal with the battery slipping out all the time. It’s a little annoying when playing the dancing games but over all it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: LaTorrya Brown

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using only twice.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two uses. Would not recommended buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: DWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality controller. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: You can spend $50 for a WiiMote with motion plus or you can spend $20. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth anything, quit working in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The remote worked fine for about 3 months before it quit responding at all. When it worked, it performed well, but despite fresh batteries it won’t even light up or try to turn on, useless. Last time I will buy an off-brand.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: The controllers worked perfectly right out of the box. The seller was kind enough to send an email in case there was any problem. This was a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after 7 months of minimal use, just a couple hours every two weeks when my daughter is in town. First the nunchuck started sticking making it unusable, then the controller itself just completely stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sanford

customer_reviews.title: games
customer_reviews.text: An additional controller meant games such as tennis could be played against a friend. Games where you take turns, such as golf or bowling were quicker and hence more fun with a controller each - good value
customer_reviews.author: eusiel martinez roblero

customer_reviews.title: You really are taking a 50/50 chance buying these
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one works, not as good as the original, but it works. The other one worked for less than 5 minutes, not sure what happened but something broke inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: This has only 1 controller not 2.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not used it. I will review when I do. In thought it came with 2 controllers as the picture shows 2. It only Congress with 1.
customer_reviews.author: AprilB

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with Wii U about a month ago. It worked fine until yesterday. It does not keep connected to the Wii U any more. Constantly losing connection makes it impossible to do any play.
customer_reviews.author: ttt

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a few times, but so far works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Button and Speaker broke after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Button and Speaker broke after 2 months. Just buy the Nintendo brand.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: controller
customer_reviews.text: Even with a controller each I am still beaten at ten pin bowling !! A wonderful way to pass time and even burn the odd calorie - my favourites are the obstacle course and the marching band !! Surprisingly, not ten pin bowling !!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Wii
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing this handset because it was such a bargain price but Im glad I risked it as this was a genuine wii remote. Cant fault this transaction and I am a very very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Motsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought, got, works, and cheaper then the "name brand" worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Chancelot

customer_reviews.title: Defective item!
customer_reviews.text: After using a few times the wires to the nunchuck pulled out and quite working. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Millers

customer_reviews.title: Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Everyone here is complaining! It's an immense remote!You Point it at the screen and the cursor comes up, it has shake control, tilt control, it's got everything!Why not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: One remote never worked. The one remote worked but the nunchuck never did.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Not legitimate but works fine
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't a legitimate controller, and doesn't work quite as well as a regular Wii controller, but it's cheap and gets the job done. It also shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dagwimweaper

customer_reviews.title: Product boxed
customer_reviews.text: Product boxed as new including protective skin and strap. Works perfectly. No more passing one controller between me and my partner. Great fun. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Item was received on time. It works as expected. My daughter and I are having a great time using it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely, works wonderful! We use this nunchuck along with original wii controllers also and all works well. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: extra Wii Controllers
customer_reviews.text: If you need extra Wii Controllers, these seem to be a good reasonably priced product. Unfortunately if there are a number of you playing with the Wii you will need extra Controllers.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: my grandson
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my grandson who tells me he has a lot of enjoyment with it.I have no personal experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hough

customer_reviews.title: THESE DON'T WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: We changed batteries, plugged them in and nothing...they don't work AT ALL. Complete waste of money, and time ordering. Absolute rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Kugler

customer_reviews.title: Make sure
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get a real one (check when you choose the one you want to buy).Bought fake one before really bad.
customer_reviews.author: kube

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you need a Wii remote.
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect, very reasonable price as well. Will be buying my controllers from here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for orginal!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and impressive feedback of controls. Defiantly as good as original Nintendo controller.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Thorn 27

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works great! I wasn’t expecting a nunchuck to come with it as well! So pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Consistant  Connection
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine when first got it began saying controller needed to be connected to console while playing game
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Bacon

customer_reviews.title: It works fine  can’t complain.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great I haven’t used it a ton but it hasn’t caused any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Yta Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Reset issue
customer_reviews.text: These controllers have to be reset after they have been turned off every use. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Desch

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dolphin
customer_reviews.text: If you want this for dolphin emulator don't reccomend it unless you have the mayflash sensor bar.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Morales

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and the quality is like a original one. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Johji Yasuda

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Works for a few months before it starts to stop working. Keeps disconnecting while trying to play
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Shipping speed
customer_reviews.text: Great product just as described. Got it when the seller promised.
customer_reviews.author: PJL

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the detector and the fast service.
customer_reviews.author: johnny s....

customer_reviews.title: Buttons malfunctioning after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had these 1 month and the A button is sticking on both controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Peck

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast and work great! Wii are really happy (; Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finicum

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend and they have enjoyed it. The color is a unique blue for Wii accessories, so it is easy to locate in the drawer. Responsive when suing and buttons perform as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: shopping
customer_reviews.text: Wanted more controllers for when the family come round and join in the fun, they were dispatched very quickly and arrived in good condition as always, and made a lot less moaning about controllers { I hope }
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Controller for Wii, PowerLead Built-in Motion Plus Remote and Nunchuck Controller for Nintendo Wii and Wii U + Silicon Case Blue
feature_bullets: 🎮【Wide Compatibility】Maintains same compatibility and backwards compatibility as the original Wii Remote, meaning that you can use it to play games even if game contains no advanced motion-control features.

🎮【Easy and Convenient 】The remote controller built-in Speaker which combines the function of pointer, speaker and shock vibration together. Connect with the console via Bluetooth by simply pressing the sync button.
🎮【Safe and stable】Silicone Skin protects the remote controller against everyday dust, hazards and scratches.Wrist Strip included for safe.
🎮【Plug & Play】Dock both of your remote and plug it into any USB port. No need to remove the battery. Powered by 2 AA batteries (not included). Convenient to carry with hand strap.

🎮【Ergonomics Design】It features 3-axis motion sensor as Wii Remote. The controller is ergonomic design, Comfortable to hold, agile to play. Extremely strict test for all of our products before sold, bringing you with a relaxed game time.
